Package game.dinosaurs

Class Allosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaurs.CapableActor
game.dinosaurs.DinoActor
game.dinosaurs.Allosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface
public class Allosaur
extends DinoActor
An aggressive carnivorous dinosaur that can attack Stegosaur.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static int ADULT_ATTACK_DAMAGE
    Amount of damage that a grown up Allosaur can cause by attacking.
    private static int BABY_ATTACK_DAMAGE
    Amount of damage that a baby Allosaur can cause by attacking.
    private static DinoEncyclopedia DINO_TYPE
    Enum type that can be referenced for a lot of useful constants that are values for Allosaur attributes.
    private static int nextId
    Id to append to a Allosaur's name to be able to differentiate between different Allosaurs.
    private java.util.HashMap<DinoActor,​java.lang.Integer> victims
    A hashmap to keep track of all DinoActors that the Allosaur has attacked by the Allosaur before within 20 turns.

    Fields inherited from class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor

    displayChar, hitPoints, inventory, maxHitPoints, name

    Decrements the attacked period of the victim
    int getAttackedPeriod​(DinoActor victim)
    Returns the number of turns that the Allosaur has to wait before it can attack the victim again.
    protected IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
    Creates an IntrinsicWeapon for the Allosaur for attacking, which is its jaw it uses to bite Stegosaur.
    boolean hasAttackedVictim​(DinoActor victim)
    Returns true if the Allosaur has attacked the same DinoActor within 20 turns, false otherwise.
    (package private) void initializeCapabilities()
    Initialize necessary capabilities of a Allosaur.
    Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    Updates the attacked period of the Allosaur's victims and removes them from the hashMap if they can now be attacked again, then the super classes playTurn method is called to select an appropriate Action the Allosaur should return for that turn.
    void removeVictim​(DinoActor victim)
    Remove a DinoActor from the victims hashMap.

  • Constructor Details

    • Allosaur

      public Allosaur​(DinoCapabilities sex, java.lang.Boolean isMatured)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      sex - DinoCapabilities.MALE is Allosaur should be male, DinoCapabilities.FEMALE is Allosaur should be female,
      isMatured - true if Allosaur is grown up, false otherwise.

      Returns:

    • getAttackedPeriod

      public int getAttackedPeriod​(DinoActor victim)
      Returns the number of turns that the Allosaur has to wait before it can attack the victim again.

    • removeVictim

      public void removeVictim​(DinoActor victim)
      Remove a DinoActor from the victims hashMap.
      Parameters:
      victim - a DinoActor that can be attacked by Allosaur again now

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Updates the attacked period of the Allosaur's victims and removes them from the hashMap if they can now be attacked again, then the super classes playTurn method is called to select an appropriate Action the Allosaur should return for that turn.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class DinoActor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed
